text: Saad Al Khairi (, born 21 June 1995) is a Saudi Arabian professional footballer who plays as a right-back for Pro League side Al-Batin on loan from Al-Ettifaq. ==Career== Al Khairi began his career with Al-Ettifaq where he was promoted from the youth team to the first team. On July 18, 2016, he was loaned out to First Division side Al-Orobah for 6 months. On August 31, 2017, he signed a 5 year contract with Al-Ettifaq tying him to the club until 2023. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Kings Cup !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Al-Ettifaq |2014–15 |First Division||4||0||2||1||0||0||6||1 |- |2015–16 |First Division||0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- |2016–17 |Pro League||1||0||1||0||0||0||2||0 |- |2017–18 |Pro League||21||0||0||0||0||0||21||0 |- |2018–19 |Pro League||3||0||1||0||–||–||4||0 |- !colspan="3"|Al-Ettifaq Total !29!!0!!4!!1!!0!!0!!33!!1 |- |rowspan="1"|Al-Orobah (loan) |2016–17 |First Division||9||0||0||0||1||0||10||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career Total !38!!0!!4!!1!!1!!0!!43!!1 |} ==References== == External links == * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Ettifaq FC players Category:Al-Orobah FC players Category:Al-Batin FC players Category:Prince Mohammad bin Salman League players Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:Saudi Arabia youth international footballers
